title: [COMPLETE] Emergency Maintenance - 25/06/2015
body:
Summoners,

**09:30AM AEST** - We've completed the maintenance and the server is open again.

**08:15AM AEST** - We are shutting down the Oceanic platform for emergency maintenance, to fix a server issue that just been discovered.  All currently running games will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded.  We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for up to **2 hours**.

Keep an eye on the [Server Status Page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) for the most up-to-date information.

Mindstar
